desc: Taste the magic of pure indulgence. Nomad dark chocolates are rich in flavour and purity. All our drinking chocolates and chocolate bars are vegan, free from dairy, gluten, soy, and preservatives to make every sip and crunch heavenly.

layout.text: EMBODYING THE DISTINCT AND DELICIOUS FLAVOURS OF THE BEANS FARMED IN EACH REGION, OUR CHOCOLATE LETS YOU WANDER THE WORLD, ONE INDULGENCE AT A TIME.
